description:
Become A Little Crazy Pet Vet Baby Boo Hospital for your fav pet today!

Diagnose and treat your pets injuries & ailments. Make sure you perform all the standard check-ups before you move on the your next super hero!

* Optimized for iOS 8
* Available for iPhone 6 & iPhone 6 plus
